languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете небольшой разрыв — быть может, результат дрогнувшей руки его создательницы... Вы направляете Кибеллу этим путем, подсказывая, куда поставить ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Окинув взглядом линии на полу, вы замечаете небольшой разрыв — быть может, лишь результат дрогнувшей руки, рисовавшей лабиринт. Тем не менее, не воспользоваться лазейкой было бы странно. Вы переходите в соседний проход, миновав большой крюк.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете небольшой разрыв — быть может, результат дрогнувшей руки его создательницы... Вы направляете Кибеллу этим путем, подсказывая, куда поставить ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to step next.{/n}
{n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to step next.{/n}
{n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}
{n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}
{n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}
{n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reparas en un diminuto hueco en una línea; puede que la mano de Kibellah temblara al dibujarla. La guías por ese camino y le indicas por dónde avanzar después.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reparas en un diminuto hueco en una línea; puede que la mano de Kibellah temblara al dibujarla. La guías por ese camino y le indicas por dónde avanzar después.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは線がわずかに途切れていることに気づく。おそらく描く時に、キベラの手が震えたのだろう。あなたは彼女をそちらへと導き、次にどこを辿ればいいのか教える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは線がわずかに途切れていることに気づく。おそらく描く時に、キベラの手が震えたのだろう。あなたは彼女をそちらへと導き、次にどこを辿ればいいのか教える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，其中一条线有一处小小的断裂，或许是绮贝菈在画的时候手缩了一下。你指引她走向这里，告诉她接下来该走向什么地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，其中一条线有一处小小的断裂，或许是绮贝菈在画的时候手缩了一下。你指引她走向这里，告诉她接下来该走向什么地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst eine winzige Unterbrechung in einer Linie – vielleicht hat Kibellahs Hand gezittert, als sie sie malte. Du führst sie den Pfad entlang und sagst ihr, wohin sie als Nächstes treten soll.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst eine winzige Unterbrechung in einer Linie – vielleicht hat Kibellahs Hand gezittert, als sie sie malte. Du führst sie den Pfad entlang und sagst ihr, wohin sie als Nächstes treten soll.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez un hiatus, sur l'une des lignes. Peut-être la main de Kibellah a-t-elle tremblé pendant qu'elle la traçait. Vous la guidez jusqu'à ce point de passage et lui dites quelle direction prendre ensuite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez un hiatus, sur l'une des lignes. Peut-être la main de Kibellah a-t-elle tremblé pendant qu'elle la traçait. Vous la guidez jusqu'à ce point de passage et lui dites quelle direction prendre ensuite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ufak bir açılma fark ediyorsun. Belki Kibellah'nın eli, onu çizerken titremiştir. Ona yolun aşağısına doğru kılavuzluk ederek bir sonraki adımlarının yerini söylüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a tiny break in a line — perhaps Kibellah's hand flinched as she was drawing it. You guide her down that path and tell her where to tread next.{/n}
